field.name: summary
field.value: Castle.Core.Tests won't build via nant because it use TraceContext without referencing System.Web.dll

field.name: description
field.value: Castle.Core.Tests.build script need to reference System.Web.dll explicitely

comment.author: gauthier
comment.text: fail.log is output before the patch castle.core.tests.build.diff is the patch to be applied that solve the problem

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Applied in r5571. I haven't tested this on Mono so I will take your word that this fixes the issue.

comment.author: gauthier
comment.text: the build ignite ok on mono now (same environment as when I created the ticket)

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
